title: Places to go, people to know, things to learn
content:
Abstract
Professor Abby Smith grew up in New England loving the ocean, and in due course became a marine scientist. From the vantage point of nearing retirement after over 30â€‰years in the game, she reflects here on where she came from, people who helped along the journey, and what she learned.
siteTitle: ICES Journal of Marine Science Current Issue
